member.name: T:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProvider
member.summary: Provides a simple diagnostic facility for tracing and profiling web traffic in applications built on Microsoft’s HTTP stacks.

member.name: E:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProvider.RequestResponseCompleted
member.summary: Subscribe to the RequestResponseCompleted event to receive a notification that a request has been submitted.

member.name: E:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProvider.RequestSent
member.summary: Subscribe to the RequestSent event to receive a notification that a request has been sent.

member.name: E:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProvider.ResponseReceived
member.summary: Subscribe to the ResponseReceived event to receive a notification that a response has been received.

member.name: M:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProvider.CreateFromProcessDiagnosticInfo(Windows.System.Diagnostics.ProcessDiagnosticInfo)
member.summary: Creates a new HttpDiagnosticProvider based on the specified ProcessDiagnosticInfo object.
member.param: The ProcessDiagnosticInfo that identifies the process to watch.
member.returns: The newly created HttpDiagnosticProvider.

member.name: M:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProvider.Start
member.summary: Starts the HttpDiagnosticProvider monitoring the attached process target.

member.name: M:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProvider.Stop
member.summary: Stops the HttpDiagnosticProvider from monitoring the attached process target.

member.name: T:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseCompletedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the RequestResponseCompleted event.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseCompletedEventArgs.ActivityId
member.summary: Gets a locally unique ID for this activity, for correlating with other events.
member.returns: A locally unique ID for this activity.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseCompletedEventArgs.Initiator
member.summary: Gets the type of operation initiating this request.
member.returns: The initiator type.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseCompletedEventArgs.ProcessId
member.summary: Gets the process ID.
member.returns: The process ID.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseCompletedEventArgs.RequestedUri
member.summary: Gets the URI of the requested response.
member.returns: The URI of the requested response.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseCompletedEventArgs.SourceLocations
member.summary: Gets the source location call stack.
member.returns: The source location call stack.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseCompletedEventArgs.ThreadId
member.summary: Gets the thread ID.
member.returns: The thread ID.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseCompletedEventArgs.Timestamps
member.summary: Gets the timestamp for connection events.
member.returns: The timestamp for connection events.

member.name: T:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseTimestamps
member.summary: Provides all the timestamps for connection events.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseTimestamps.CacheCheckedTimestamp
member.summary: Gets the last time local cache was checked.
member.returns: The time that local cache was checked.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseTimestamps.ConnectionCompletedTimestamp
member.summary: Gets the timestamp for the end of the TCP connection phase.
member.returns: The timestamp for the end of the TCP connection phase.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseTimestamps.ConnectionInitiatedTimestamp
member.summary: Gets the timestamp for the start of the TCP connection phase.
member.returns: The timestamp for the start of the TCP connection phase.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseTimestamps.NameResolvedTimestamp
member.summary: Gets the time of the DNS name resolution.
member.returns: The time of the DNS name resolution.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseTimestamps.RequestCompletedTimestamp
member.summary: Gets the timestamp for the last byte sent.
member.returns: The timestamp for the last byte sent.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseTimestamps.RequestSentTimestamp
member.summary: Gets the timestamp for the first byte sent.
member.returns: The timestamp for the first byte sent.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseTimestamps.ResponseCompletedTimestamp
member.summary: Gets the timestamp for the last byte received.
member.returns: The timestamp for the last byte received.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseTimestamps.ResponseReceivedTimestamp
member.summary: Gets the timestamp for the fir byte received.
member.returns: The timestamp for the fir byte received.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderRequestResponseTimestamps.SslNegotiatedTimestamp
member.summary: Gets the time of the SSL handshake negotiation.
member.returns: The time of the SSL handshake negotiation.

member.summary: Provides data for the RequestSent event.

member.summary: Gets the type of operation initiating this request.

member.summary: Gets the HttpRequestMessage including headers.

member.summary: Gets the process ID.

member.summary: Gets the thread ID.

member.summary: Gets a locally unique ID for this activity, for correlating with other events.

member.summary: Gets the HttpResponseMessage including headers, the status code, and data.

member.name: P:Windows.Web.Http.Diagnostics.HttpDiagnosticProviderResponseReceivedEventArgs.Timestamp
member.summary: Gets the timestamp of when the HttpResponseMessage was received.
